testcase.name: Successful login and logout
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I login with username "ramyateja" and password "RamyaTeja@01"..........passed Then I should see a welcome "ramyateja" message.............................passed When I logout...............................................................passed Then I should be back on the login page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login shows an error message - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I login with username "wrong" and password "SuperSecretPassword!"......passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed

testcase.name: Invalid login shows an error message - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I login with username "tomsmith" and password "wrong"..................passed Then I should see an error message..........................................passed

testcase.name: Adding Items to cart and placing order
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the login page................................................passed When I add item "Samsung galaxy s6" to cart.................................passed When I add item "Nokia lumia 1520" to cart..................................passed Then I move to cart page....................................................passed Then check whether item "Samsung galaxy s6" added to the cart or not........passed Then check whether item "Nokia lumia 1520" added to the cart or not.........passed Then delete item "Nokia lumia 1520" from cart...............................passed When I add item "Nexus 6" to cart...........................................passed Then the total should be 1010...............................................passed Then I place the order with name "Name", country "Country", city "City", card "123", month "11", year "2025".passed Then I should see order confirmation details................................passed
